argument.name: setting_name
argument.description: The name of the setting that you wish to create.

argument.name: dictionary
argument.description: Optional. Default = data dictionary (.ALB file) for the current database. Path and filename of any Alpha Anywhere data dictionary file (i.e. a .ALB, .DDD or .SET file), or a text file.

page.description: Deletes a saved setting. Setting created by a5_settings(). Record name is 'setting_name' and type is 'SAVU'.
page.discussion: The A5_DELETE_SETTINGS() function removes user defined settings from a data dictionary.
page.example: dim family as P dim family.kids as P dim ret as P family.mom = "Irene" family.dad = "David" family.kids.first = "Sam" family.kids.second = "Pam" a5_save_settings("MyFamily", family, "c:\settings1.txt") a5_delete_settings("MyFamily") a5_load_settings("MyFamily", ret) ? ret =
